name: Nh.d Studio
description:
Nh.d Studio is a creative and energetic group with over 10 years of experience providing clients, large and small, with art direction and consultation services. Over the years we have had the pleasure of working with clients such as PBS, Autism Society, and National Geographic.
Regardless of the project size we always work closely with a client to ensure that design goals are being met and that the best possible visual solutions are achieved.
